title: Interpreting Graphs of Proportional Relationships
learningGoals: Comprehend that for the equation of a proportional relationship, the constant represents the constant of proportionality
Create graphs and equations of proportional relationships in context, including an appropriate scale
Interpret diagrams or graphs of proportional relationships in context

scenarios.name: Turtle Race
scenarios.description: Two turtles racing - draw a third turtle going half as fast

scenarios.name: Drone Race
scenarios.description: Two drones flying - draw one going twice as fast

scenarios.name: Robot Challenge
scenarios.description: Two robots moving - draw one going one-third as fast
